title: looking for a beginner team
body: Hey Im just starting and I really want to find a nice team to play some games with.

replies.body:
Hey mate, I finish exams on wednesday. I'd be happy to play some games as I'm pretty bad bronze 5 :)
Can play all roles
sweet! your better than me hahah, I'll add u now :):)
Hi, I'm new as well (level 18). It'd be cool to play together, add me if you'd like to (^-^)

Hi there.

I'm quite new as well but have got to grips with a few ADC and mid lane champions already. 

Keen to get involved with a few people!
I'm just starting out as well, Level 16 atm, you're welcome to add me if you want.  Love playing support :)
